raw_response: {"answer_index": 2, "answer_text": "Proliferation of surfactant-secreting cells", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "After alveolar injury, type II pneumocytes (which secrete surfactant) proliferate to restore the alveolar lining and can differentiate into type I pneumocytes.
